ygData.subject: Re: [shadowknight] Newbie here :) with questions..
ygData.msgSnippet: Actually the first character I chose, and my main character is a High Elf Pally who likes to pick on DE s...or at least likes to annoy them with my
ygData.messageBody:
Actually the first character I chose, and my main
character is a High Elf Pally who likes to pick on
DE's...or at least likes to annoy them with my
niceness...esp SKs. I've gotten anything from
growls...annoyance..to SKs actaully breaking down and
being nice to me. Don't growl at me now....I think I'm
going to like my Sk now after I start choosing her r-p
character.

I know my SK will be nice to other DE's..just not sure
how mean I can roll-play msyelf to other races...I
think I like the stuck up bit over the 'piss on
corpse'..but thats just me ;) I do think I like that
demand that they shout praises to our god before we
locate the corpse! :)

Well, I have class to get to now..

Thank you & Take care fellow Sks :)

Saelena


--- Brenton <bwmcgehee@...> wrote:
> Roleplaying is a BI%^& as an SK.
>
> We are the "most evil" of them all. Of course, this
> is the true path, the only path, the path of blood.
>
>
> In my realm, I'm taken as a ahole because I usually
> don't help newbies who are not of my god and/or
> class. Seeing as we are the supreme Class, we
> should be aloff and not caring. And talk that way.
> Convert or die.
> *
> Watch a good race die, then ( /em urinates on
> corpse) when he/she returns for it. If they whine,
> tell them they are not worthy of your help.
> *
> You can help them, but be true to our god in doing
> so.
>
> Before you do a locate corpse, have them shout out
> praises to your god.
>
> While this is all fun, it sux when you need help.
> So keep close to your brothers and sisters.
>
>
> Batleth
> ShadowKnight Iksar
>
> "This Knight never Falls"
